00194 template <class Element>
00195 inline int TVarArray<Element>::GetSize(int dimension) const
00196 {
00197        Q_ASSERT(dimension >= 0);
00198        Q_ASSERT(dimension < m_sizes.GetDimensionsCount());
00199 
00200        return m_sizes[dimension];

00204 template <class Element>
00205 inline const Element& TVarArray<Element>::GetAt(const IndexType& index) const
00206 {
00207        Q_ASSERT(index.IsInside(m_sizes));
00208 
00209        int elementIndex = GetElementIndex(index);
00210        Q_ASSERT(elementIndex < int(m_elements.size()));
00211 
00212        return m_elements[elementIndex];
00213 }
00214

00217 inline void TVarArray<Element>::SetAt(const IndexType& index, const Element& value)
00218 {
00219        Q_ASSERT(index.IsInside(m_sizes));
00220 
00221        int elementIndex = GetElementIndex(index);
00222        Q_ASSERT(elementIndex < int(m_elements.size()));
00223 
00224        m_elements[elementIndex] = value;
00225 }

00260 
00261 template <class Element>
00262 inline int TVarArray<Element>::GetElementIndex(const IndexType& index) const
00263 {
00264        int indexDimensionsCount = index.GetDimensionsCount();
00265        int dimensionsCount = m_sizes.GetDimensionsCount();
00266 
00267        int minDimensionsCount = qMin(indexDimensionsCount, dimensionsCount);
00268 
00269        int elementIndex = 0;
00270        int cumulatedSizes = 1;
00271        for (int i = 0; i < minDimensionsCount; ++i){
00272               Q_ASSERT(index[i] >= 0);
00273               Q_ASSERT(index[i] < m_sizes[i]);
00274 
00275               elementIndex += index[i] * cumulatedSizes;
00276 
00277               cumulatedSizes *= m_sizes[i];
00278        }
00279 
00280        return elementIndex;
00281 }

00319 template <class Element>

00321 {
00322        Q_ASSERT(dimension >= 0);
00323        Q_ASSERT(dimension < m_sizes.GetDimensionsCount());

00328 
00329        return true;

00333 template <class Element>
00334 void TVarArray<Element>::SetAllElements(const Element& value)
00335 {
00336        for (         Elements::Iterator iter = m_elements.begin();
00337                             iter != m_elements.end();
00338                             ++iter){
00339               *iter = value;
00340        }
00341 }

00344 // protected methods

00346 template <class Element>
00347 void TVarArray<Element>::UpdateElementsSize()
00348 {
00349        int dimensionsCount = m_sizes.GetDimensionsCount();
00350        int cumulatedSizes = 1;
00351        for (int i = 0; i < dimensionsCount; ++i){
00352               cumulatedSizes *= m_sizes[i];
00353        }
00354 
00355        m_elements.resize(cumulatedSizes);
00356 }

00414 template <class Element>
00415 typename TVarArray<Element>::Iterator& TVarArray<Element>::Iterator::operator++()
00416 {
00417        if ((m_arrayPtr != NULL) && !Increase(m_arrayPtr->GetSizes())){
00418               m_arrayPtr = NULL;
00419        }
00420 
00421        return *this;
00422 }

00471 template <class Element>
00472 bool TVarArray<Element>::Iterator::operator==(const Iterator& iterator) const
00473 {
00474        if ((m_arrayPtr != NULL) && (iterator.m_arrayPtr != NULL)){
00475               return (m_arrayPtr == iterator.m_arrayPtr) && (BaseClass::operator==(iterator));
00476        }
00477 
00478        return (m_arrayPtr == iterator.m_arrayPtr);
00479 }

00491 template <class Element>
00492 TVarArray<Element>::Iterator::Iterator(TVarArray* arrayPtr)
00493 :      BaseClass((arrayPtr != NULL)? arrayPtr->GetDimensionsCount(): 0, 0), m_arrayPtr(arrayPtr)
00494 {
00495        if ((m_arrayPtr != NULL) && !IsInside(m_arrayPtr->GetSizes())){
00496               m_arrayPtr = NULL;   // if it is not inside of array set it directly to the end iterator state
00497        }
